import React from 'react' import './hero.css' import Title from '../../common/title/Title' const Hero = ()=>{ return ( <>
<section className='feature-grid'> <section className='feature-gallery'> <section className='top-row'> <div className='grid-img-big'></div> <div className='top-right'> <h2>Features</h2> <p>Feature description</p> <div className='top-small'> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> </div> </div> </section> <section className='bottom-row'> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> <div className='grid-img-small'></div> </section> </section> </section> <section> <Title title='Get to know us'/> <section className='about-row'> <div className='about-card'></div> <div className='about-content'> <h2>Founder name</h2> <p>Add content about founder here</p> </div> </section> <section className='about-row'> <div className='about-content'> <h2>Founder name</h2> <p>Add content about founder here</p> </div> <div className='about-card'></div> </section> </section> </> ) } export default Hero
